sentences.en: But it is undoubted that to establish criminal legal relation is necessary.
sentences.cn: 笔者在论述刑事法律关系存在的必然性的基础上也批判了相关理论.

sentences.en: Even the president's undoubted charisma has not rendered him immune.
sentences.cn: 甚至HugoChávez总统 不容置疑的个人魅力亦无法使他豁免.
他写了几本无庸置疑的杰作.
他的诚意是无容置疑的.

sentences.en: His undoubted eccentricity was partly a matter of personal style.
sentences.cn: 他的怪癖确实存在,部分是个人风格问题.

sentences.en: I have paralysed in bed for about ten years, and become to a undoubted dummy.
sentences.cn: 我已瘫痪在床数十载, 还成了名副其实的哑巴.

sentences.en: It is undoubted that merger acquisition research to have important practice value.
sentences.cn: 毋庸置疑,并购重组研究具有重要的实践价值.

sentences.en: Nevertheless, investment organization inspect a lot of items, this undoubted meeting aggravate competes.
sentences.cn: 不过, 投资机构一波一波的考察很多项目, 这无疑会加剧竞争.

sentences.en: She has an undoubted talent as an organizer.
She is undoubted star of British ballet.
sentences.cn: 她是英国毋庸置疑的芭蕾明星.

sentences.en: Thanks for your performance until now and for your undoubted future success as well.
sentences.cn: 感谢你们的所做的一切努力,预祝你们取得更大的成绩和光荣.

sentences.en: The event was an undoubted success.
sentences.cn: 这件事毫无疑问是成功的。

sentences.en: The film was an undoubted success.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，那部电影很成功。

sentences.en: The performance was an undoubted success.
Undoubted, acid test and challenge are for this generator to pily industry, person that machine, operator.
sentences.cn: 无疑, 这对于棉花行业的生产者 、 加工者 、 经营者来说都是一次严重的考验与挑战.

sentences.en: Undoubted, it has the value of example to us.
sentences.cn: 无疑, 它对我们具有样本的价值.

trans.tran_cn: 无疑的，肯定的，确实的，真正的，无可置疑
trans.tran_en: definitely true or known to exist
